name: coaxially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shares an axis (= central point): The laser energy is delivered to the affected area through a set of microcatheters inserted sequentially and coaxially into each other. The reference was placed at the side of the moving element, rather than coaxially.
More examplesFewer examplesTo prevent blood clotting, a saline solution was continuously infused through a tube situated coaxially inside the catheter.The magnetic core is a solid steel cylinder, embedded inside the nylon stick coaxially.
